title: Hero Units
paragraph: Every special unit has it's own hero. A hero unit is a more powerful version of the according special unit.

dynamicContents.content: The hero can be unlocked in stage 2 of the {{ runes # article/systems/runes }}.A special unit has to be chosen and at least one ability must be fully upgraded before the hero gets unlockable.

After the hero is unlocked, you can summon the hero on any {{ control field # article/fields/control }}. Unlike other units, the hero won't get recruited but summoned. You can only have one hero and if he falls in a fight the resurrection countdown starts (visible on every control field). After the resurrection time runs out, you can summon him again.

The hero unit can also be upgraded twice, which increases his stats but also the stats of the special units. Like their special units, every hero has the core feature. This means, the Teryx hero can attack over a distance up to 5 fields, the Ovivi hero can teleport and take other units with him and the Raider Naki hero can steal soulstones. However, the hero can not learn the additional abilities of the special units.
